org.springframework.osgi.service.importer.event
Class OsgiServiceDependencyEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
          org.springframework.osgi.service.importer.event.OsgiServiceDependencyEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
OsgiServiceDependencyWaitEndedEvent, OsgiServiceDependencyWaitStartingEvent, OsgiServiceDependencyWaitTimedOutEvent
public abstract class OsgiServiceDependencyEvent
extends ApplicationEvent

Base event type used for sending dependencies notifications. Usually these are sent by Spring-DM OSGi importers.

Author:
Costin Leau
See Also:
Serialized Form
